meaning_str.bing:
adj. 完全的；全部的；绝对的；（口语中尤用以强调）道地的
n. 绝对（指思想或原理）
网络. 绝对定位；无条件的；纯粹的

完全的；全部的；绝对的；（口语中尤用以强调）道地的
绝对定位；无条件的；纯粹的

完全的；绝对的；无限的；不受约束的；不相对的；独立自主的；纯粹的；完整无缺的；明确的；确实的；十足的；无疑的；不容置疑的；<口>（尤用以强调）道地的
绝对概念；绝对真理；完全独立的事物；（哲学中的）绝对者

1.en: A woman's cowardice can be so absolute as to cast her into the jaws of her aversion.
1.cn: 女人的懦弱会不会如此强烈，以致把她投入她厌恶的人的血盆大口。

2.en: In a short, white minidress, with masses of flowers in her luxuriant blonde locks, she was the absolute picture of joy and happiness.
2.cn: 她穿着一身白色迷你短裙，浓密的金发挽成发髻，点缀着一簇鲜花。她本身就是一幅快乐和幸福的话画面。

3.en: The absolute maximum-moment of a crane girder is usually calculated with expressions provided by handbook.
3.cn: 对吊车梁绝对最大弯矩的计算，通常采用手册给出的公式直接计算得到；

0.en: They almost have what they want: absolute control.
0.cn: 他们就快要得逞了，获得绝对掌控。

1.en: There was absolute trust between us. The memory sticks guaranteed it. We all had one.
1.cn: 我们之间绝对信任，记忆棒确保了这点。我们每人一个。

2.en: I tracked it down through insurance records. An old claim that was settled under terms of absolute secrecy.
2.cn: 我翻遍保险资料，理赔条件是要绝对保密。

3.en: I was there to push people beyond what's expected of them. I believe that is an absolute necessity.
3.cn: 我是去逼他们突破自己的极限的，我相信这是绝对不可或缺的。

4.en: Boy, do we have problems up here! The problem of evil in the world. The problem of absolute virtue.
4.cn: 天，我们这里有问题吗？世界上的邪恶所引发的问题，绝对的美德引发的问题。

5.en: There's no such thing as absolute power for us, except on the receiving end. Using fear will get you nowhere.
5.cn: 人类无权拥有绝对的权力，只能接受上帝的统治，用恐惧统治不会有好下场。

6.en: After much consideration, actually, 30 minutes of consideration, I have concluded that control of one's body is an absolute.
6.cn: 经过审慎考虑，其实也就30分钟，本席认定个人对自身身体享有绝对控制权。

7.en: And Paul Franklin and his team, they were thrilled to get algorithms that were the absolute latest, most interesting and up-to-the-minute.
7.cn: 而保罗富兰克林和他的团队，他们很激动能获得算法，它们绝对是最新最有趣的算法。

8.en: Speak for yourself, honey. I know that I have the absolute love and loyalty of my children who like me fine and always will.
8.cn: 你只能代表你自己，亲爱的，我知道我对我的孩子有着绝对的爱和忠诚，他们都很爱我，并会一直爱下去。

9.en: I can say with absolute confidence that after speaking with the rest of the flight crew, with bird experts, aviation engineers, after running through every scenario, after interviewing each player, there is still an X in this result and it's you, Captain Sullenberger.
9.cn: 在同其他机组成员、鸟类专家、还有航空工程师谈过后，在分析过每一种场景，访谈了每一个责任方后，我有绝对的把握这样说，结果的方程式仍然少了一个未知数，那就是你，机长萨伦伯格。

10.en: He pointed out that even if a country can produce pretty much everything at the lowest possible cost, with what economists call an absolute advantage, it's still better to focus on the products it can make most efficiently, that sacrifice the least amount of other goods, and let the rest of the world do the same.
10.cn: 他指出即使一个国家能用最低的成本生产所有东西，也就是经济学家所说的拥有「绝对利益」最好的还是专注于最有效率的生产并放弃其他选项，而让其他国家也做相同的事。

11.en: It has the potential to be absolute hell, doesn't it?
11.cn: 完全有可能是地狱般的经历，不是吗？

12.en: End of story. No bird. That to me is an absolute tragedy.
12.cn: 再就没有后续了，没有大鸟了。对我来说那简直就是悲剧。

13.en: I love seeing you at my table, Nicky. You remind me of a rose. An absolute rose, doesn't he?
13.cn: 你能上我这儿吃晚餐真好，尼克，你让我想到玫瑰。他难道不像玫瑰吗？

14.en: In case you didn't notice, that is a scary man. He's right though, the '74 is absolute piss.
14.cn: 你应该注意到了，他真的很可怕。但他说的对，74年的酒真的很难喝。

15.en: I understand the Old Testament God, whose power is absolute, who rules through fear, but him…
15.cn: 我理解《旧约》的上帝，至高无上的权力，用恐惧统治人类，但是他...

16.en: Since never. The captain is being charged with embezzlement and fraud. This is an absolute disaster.
16.cn: 一直都没有，直到上校因挪用公款和诈骗被起诉了，这完全是个灾难。

17.en: Until recently, I would've said with absolute certainty that he was greater, far greater, than the sum of his parts.
17.cn: 要是以前，我会极其肯定地说他的整体远远好于全部。

18.en: What's the absolute soonest you can deploy? Twelve hours, Mr. President. But that would involve an extremely high degree…
18.cn: 那调派最快需要多久？12小时，总统先生。但这涉及极高的……

19.en: From the data at hand, you really can't draw that conclusion. All you can say with absolute certainty is that that joke is not funny here.
19.cn: 就目前的数据来说，你还不能得出这结论，你所能唯一确定的是这笑话在这儿不好笑。
